description: A MU has been associated with this Radio Address.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apMuVlan SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapMuMac s EXAMPLE SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapRadioMac s EXAMPLE SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapVlanId i 9999

description: MU that has been associated.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapMuMac

description: Radio to be which MU has been associated.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapRadioMac

description: Dynamic VLAN ID assigned to the MU.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapVlanId

description: Radios are either been SHUTTING DOWN or RESTORING
because of a certain activity at LAN Port.

Summary.eval: ($v1==1) ? 'Radio is shutdown due to $v2' : 'Radio is restored'

description: Action taken by the Radios either Shutting Down
or Restoring Up.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapLanMonitorMode

description: Activity at the LAN port which caused this
event to happen.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapLanMonitorReason

description: When a subsequent MIC failure occurs within 60 seconds
of the preceding failure, the AP will disassociate all
associated STAs. The AP will not deliver any class 3 TKIP
encrypted data frames to or from any peer as well as
disallow new associations for a period of 60 seconds.

event.Summary: Successive MIC failure occurs within 60 secs

description: ESSID for which MIC failure happened.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapWpaCounterMeasureEssid

description: An MU is either Authenticated or Deauthenticated
on a Hotspot enabled WLAN. Upon authenticating with a
Radius Server the state of the MU is changed from HOTSPOT
to DATA_READY and the vice versa upon Time out or
Logging out of that particular MU.
The MAC Address of the MU which undergoes a state
changed on a Hotspot enabled WLAN.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlMuMac

description: The change in the state of an MU associated on
a Hotspot enabled WLAN.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlMuHotspotStateChange

description: A DynDNS Update has been sent to DynDns.org
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apDynDNSUpdate SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlDynDNSUpdateIp s EXAMPLE SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlDynDNSUpdateHostname s EXAMPLE SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlDynDNSUpdateStatus s EXAMPLE

description: Description.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlDynDNSUpdateIp

description: Description.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlDynDNSUpdateHostname

description: Description.
variables.name: SYMBOL-AP-MIB::apTrapCtrlDynDNSUpdateStatus
